timer.title: Timer
timer.cancelTimerMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel the timer?
timer.setDurationError: Please set a duration for the timer.
timer.saveError: Failed to save timer. Please try again.
timer.errorLoadingTimers: Error loading timers. Please try again.
timer.noTimers: No timers found. Create a new timer to get started!
timer.deleteError: Failed to delete timer. Please try again.
timer.updateError: Failed to update timer. Please try again.
timer.deleteTimerConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this timer? This action cannot be undone.
timer.activeSessionError: You already have an active session.
timer.activeSessionErrorSub: Finish it before starting a new one.

alarmPermission.title: Allow setting alarms and reminders
alarmPermission.description:
This timer requires a high-priority alarm to work.

The alarm will ring continuously, even when your phone is locked, until you dismiss it. Without this permission, timers cannot start.
